Hi St.Ack, 

Thank you very much... HERITRIX_OUT_LOG really told me what wa=
s
happening. It was a config problem, but now it's solved.

Andr=E9

--- In=
 archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, stack <stack@a...> wrote:
>
> andlanna wr=
ote:
> > Hi there,
> >
> > I'm using Heritrix for about 4 months. I always =
used the 8080 port on
> > it, and there were no problems on initialization.=

> >
> > But now, when I try to start it (using any port), it does not
> > =
initialize. Those dots that show the progress increases
> > indefiteness...=
 They don't stop.
> >
> > Anybody has an idea of what is going on?
> 
> Loo=
k in $HERITRIX_HOME/heritrix_out.log.  It'll tell you whats going.  
> Perh=
aps there is an old heritrix running already occupying port 8080?  
> Herit=
rix on JVM 1.5 will also start another server on 8849 -- the JVM 
> JMX Age=
nt.  Check for that too.
> 
> St.Ack
> >
> > Thanks in advance for support.=

> > Andr=E9 Lanna
